Reference

Tidy Test Output

High-level functions with prettified output

tadaa_aov()

Tadaa, ANOVA!

tadaa_chisq()

Tadaa, Chi-Square Test!

tadaa_kruskal()

Tadaa, Kruskal-Wallis!

tadaa_levene()

Levene's Test for Homoskedasticity

tadaa_one_sample()

Tadaa, one-sample tests!

tadaa_pairwise_t()

Extended Pairwise t-Tests

tadaa_pairwise_tukey()

Tukey HSD pairwise comparisons

tadaa_t.test()

Tadaa, t-Test!

tadaa_wilcoxon()

Tadaa, Wilcoxon!

tadaa_z.test()

Tadaa, z-test! No seriously.

Descriptive Statistics

For, you know, descriptive statistics

modus()

Modus

nom_c()

Contingency Coefficient C

nom_chisqu()

Simple Chi^2

nom_lambda()

Lambda

nom_phi()

Phi coefficient

nom_v()

Cramer's V

ord_gamma()

Gamma

ord_pairs()

Retrieve all type of pairs for ordinal statistics

ord_somers_d()

Somers' D

ord_tau()

Various Tau Statistics

tadaa_nom()

Get all the nominal stats

tadaa_ord()

Get all the ordinal stats

etasq()

Just eta^2.

CIs

Conficence intervals and helpers

mean_ci_sem()

Standard Error of the Mean with CI

mean_ci_t()

Get mean and CI for a numeric vector

confint_t() confint_norm()

Confidence Intervals

Effect Sizes

effect_size_t()

Simple Effect Size Calculation for t-Tests

Misc helpers

z.test()

One- and Two-Sample z-Test

delete_na()

Delete cases with set amount of missing values

Convenience functions for interval recodes

Convenience functions for interval recodes

pval_string()

Easy p-value formatting

z()

Convert numeric vector to z-values

inv()

Inverting scales

Plotting Templates
